DOC.brief_summary: This study examine contingency management ( CM ) intervention design provide incentive lose weight versus participate manual-guided behavioral weight loss intervention alone . Participants CM condition earn opportunity win prize lose weight complete activity contribute weight loss , keep daily food physical activity diary , choose healthy food , exercise , use weight loss strategy . The investigator determine CM improves weight loss relative usual care manual-guided intervention alone .
DOC.criteria: age 18 65 year body mass index kg/m2 ( BMI ) 30.0 39.9 seat blood pressure 100/60140/90 mmHg ability speak English read 6th grade level willingness randomly assign one two group serious acute chronic medical problem may impact dietary exercise regimens impact weight loss psychiatric exclusion
